bibl.title: Stein's Style Nouveau and the Post-Consulates of Iustinus II and Tiberius II.
bibl.note: Confronte les réflexions de: Ernest STEIN, Post-consulat et αὐτοκρατορία, Mélanges Bidez. II = AnnPhilHist 2 (1934) pp. 869-912 = Opera Minora Selecta (Amsterdam, 1968) pp. 315-358, à la documentation papyrologique.
